description: This basic vegan coleslaw recipe substitutes vegan yogurt for some of the mayo, making it much lighter than traditional coleslaw. If vegan yogurt isnâ€™t available, feel free to use my Tofu-Cashew Mayo instead.
name: Basic Low-Fat Coleslaw
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons vegan mayo (use a low-fat one like my Tofu-Cashew Mayo)
1/4-1/2 teaspoon dill weed, caraway seed, or celery seed

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the hard core from the cabbage quarters. Shred each quarter using the slicing or shredding disk of a food processor or shred thinly by hand. Place into a large bowl. Shred carrot and add to cabbage.
Combine remaining ingredients and whisk well. Pour over cabbage and toss to coat. Best if allowed to chill for at least 30 minutes but can be eaten right away.
